column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Jinya has a really great selection of different ramen. I tried the tonkatsu spicy. I added extra spice and garlic as well. I think the kale ramen is an interesting take
column2: it tastes like regular noodles. We additionally tried some of their new appetizers such as the shrimp and crispy rice
column3: it was okay. I think if you don't mind waiting
